data.eml:eml: Morphology and identification of the final instar nymphs of three cicadas (Hemiptera, Cicadidae) in Guanzhong Plain, China based on comparative morphometrics

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hou, Zehai, Li, Qinglong, Wei, Cong (2014): Morphology and identification of the final instar nymphs of three cicadas (Hemiptera, Cicadidae) in Guanzhong Plain, China based on comparative morphometrics. ZooKeys 425: 33-50, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.425.7897, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.425.7897
